long_description: Slide rails, boost off kickers and throw 360s with ease in the Ride Revolt snowboard bindings. Cushioned footbeds soften your landings while flexible highbacks give you amazing control. Medium-flexing Foundation Chassis are contoured and profiled for lightweight precision; quick-adjust heel-cup design allows micro-adjustments in seconds. Wedgie(TM) 2.5 fixed-position footbeds align the ankles and knees in a more natural position and add board leverage for more pop power without changing your stance width. SlimeBack DE highbacks are suitable for all types of terrain; urethane material absorbs shock and damps vibrations to smooth out your ride. Freestyle Core dual-density ankle strap features 3D padding for comfort; large center core for enhanced flex and motion. Convertible ThinGrip toe straps can be worn across the top or over the front of boots to hold you in tight; you can change positions on the fly. Durable aluminum AstroGlyde LT Ratchets buckles. Ride Revolt snowboard bindings are compatible with Burton The Channel snowboards, disc conversion kit is sold separately.
